text: Johannes Andreas Maria "Jan" Reijnen (3 February 1927 – 7 April 2020) was a Dutch politician of the Catholic People's Party and its successor the Christian Democratic Appeal. He served as a Senator from 1972 to 1977. He was also mayor of Wervershoof (1964–1969), Oldenzaal (1969–1976) and Heerlen (1976–1986). He was born in Kaatsheuvel, North Brabant. Reijnen died in Wassenaar, South-Holland on 4 April 2020. He was 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch mayors Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Jan Reijnen
